title: Bloomberg Markets: Doraine on Outlook for Puerto Rico Munis

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Charles Doraine Chief Executive Officer Doraine Wealth Management Discussing seeing "light at the end of the tunnel" in the debt crisis in Puerto Rico.
